module.p: Eaglais na h-Alba The Church of Scotland is an ergonymic name-description.

section.p:
Some examples –
Bha dà mhinistear à Eaglais na h-Alba aig a’ choinneimh.
There were two church of Scotland ministers at the meeting. td. 256

Some examples –
’S e eaglais pharaiste Eaglais na h-Alba ann an Dùn Èideann a th’ ann an Eaglais nam Manach Liath.
Greyfriars Kirk is a parish church of the Church of Scotland located in Edinburgh. Eaglais nam Manach Liath
